type¶

Value must be one of {‘secondRowStripe’, ‘secondSubtotalColumn’, ‘wholeTable’, ‘firstSubtotalColumn’, ‘pageFieldLabels’, ‘thirdSubtotalColumn’, ‘thirdRowSubheading’, ‘totalRow’, ‘firstRowStripe’, ‘firstHeaderCell’, ‘lastTotalCell’, ‘firstColumn’, ‘lastColumn’, ‘pageFieldValues’, ‘firstColumnStripe’, ‘thirdSubtotalRow’, ‘secondColumnSubheading’, ‘secondRowSubheading’, ‘thirdColumnSubheading’, ‘lastHeaderCell’, ‘firstTotalCell’, ‘firstRowSubheading’, ‘blankRow’, ‘headerRow’, ‘firstSubtotalRow’, ‘secondSubtotalRow’, ‘firstColumnSubheading’, ‘secondColumnStripe’}
